reviews.review: Sam won't play with me anymore and killer makes hate my life. 10/10.

Das Spiel besteht zur einen Hälfte aus verschwendetem Potential und zur anderen aus unausbalancierten Killern. Nach 205 Stunden Spielzeit bin ich nun endlich an dem Punkt, an dem ich das Spiel schließe und erst einmal ein entspannendes Bad einlassen muss. Verständlicherweise mit meinem Toaster oder wahlweise mit einem angesteckten Fön. Dieses Projekt meinerseits ist ebenso wie meine schwere Drogensucht auch darin begründet, dass das Spiel einen dauerhaft dazu zwingt, Ranglistenspiele zu spielen, da kein weiterer Modus existiert. Das ist aber gar kein Problem, da das Matchmaking-System keinen fliegenden F*** auf den Rang eines Spielers gibt und somit genauso schlecht funktioniert wie wenn man versucht einem Blinden ein High Five zu geben.

I cannot recommend boycotting this game enough, the majority of the time you will be placed with the most toxic people you can imagine both killers and survivors, the game is so far to the killers side that it's absolutely disgusting. the only fairness you will find is with players who refuse to give money to this premium game that sports predatory microtransactions. the developers have gone on record stating that mechanics that they don't like are fine because they just ignore them. do not support this game or these people. i would say wait for them to fix the balance, hit boxes, net code, but they've said that none of that is or has been a problem so they won't. at one point it was something great but no longer and never again will it be.

Das Game macht fun mit Freunden oder Alleine. Es ist aber nichts für welche, die kein Horror abkönnen, auch wenn es in diesem Spiel noch recht in Ordnung ist. Es ist eher ein Survival als ein Horror-game. Außerdem kann es auch echt süchtig machen.

This would be an addicting game if it weren't for the matchmaking system putting you up against 3/5 rank 1 players when you are 10 or above. Maybe you could have the ability to explore maps without being in a ranked match or a custom only if you have friends. Have to limit myself to 3 or 4 games of getting rolled per day. The most incredible potential is there however and when you get into a good match made game where everyone is around the same rank it's goooooooooooooooood.

Dead By Daylight is a fun game with a very cool concept, however, when it comes the killer they are given insane advantages over the survivors and chances are it will never ever change. Killers get to camp the hook with no penalty and they also get to tunnel someone taken directly off the hook. Now, you may suggest to me that running borrowed time would be beneficial. Yes, it would. But tell me what happens when their borrowed time runs out and the trash killer is still tunnelling them? They get to camp and tunnel and slug with no repercussions. So if I had to say which position is harder to play, its the survivor category because killers are handed every single thing on a silver platter in this game. Dbd please listen to your community for once and actually fix camping (ie. deduct points for staying in hooked survivors radius for too long, place a barrier around hooked survivors so the killer can't stand in their face and wait for them to be unhooked.) So many changes could make this game so much better.

The only good asymetrical multiplayer game on the market rn, its got great moments and hellish moments. Community is toxic, balancing hasnt been great recently but ultimately this isnt that competitive a game and the balancing issues arent egregious enough to ruin things. 

There is a big skill gap which is always good. 

Would recommend purchasing if its on sale and you want a casual game which can give some good experiences but also has the potential to be played more often

살인마가 매우 불리한 게임

디스코드나 커뮤니티가 활성화되어서 파티 구하기가 쉬워져서 생존자는 다인큐 여럿이서 뭉쳐서 소통을 하는 반면에

살인마는 강력한 생존자들의 공격에 한명도 죽이지 못하는 경우가 매우 많이 발생하는데다가

끝나고 채팅으로 ezez ( 이지 ) 이러면서 욕을 하고 랜턴으로 빛을 쪼아 의도적으로 게임을 하지 못하게 한다

살인마는 일방적으로 공격당하는 경우가 대부분이며 이때문에 대부분 생존자만 하려고하는데 살인마 유저가 너무 없어서
생존자도 게임을 못하므로 둘다 게임을 못하고 결국 사람들이 게임을 접기 시작하는게 최악의 밸런스 게임

지금은 정말로 추천하고 싶지않다 하지말길 바란다 최악의 게임

Ich finde das Spiel seit dem Großen neuen Update sehr viel ausgeglichener zu den Seiten der Überlebenden, vor dem Update war es mit jedem Update immer mehr und mehr in richtung der Killer gerutscht und hatte dann auch keine Spaß mehr gemacht.

I really do like this game which is why i'd recommend it. The thrill of the chase is fun from either side of the game (killer or survivor) and atmosphere is top notch. My only issue is the matchmaking for groups. I'm new to the game and the friends i play with are high level players. Whenever I try to play a few games with them we usually get one, i get murdered almost immediately, they finish the game  and then it takes forever to find another one. My only assumption is that the matchmaking really doesn't want new people to group up with more experienced people. Other than that progression is pretty fluid, microtransactions aren't really annoying, and there's enough variety to keep you interested for a decent amount of time.
One of my favourite games ever ^-^
